Articles.Content:
hi,
I've a minor issue with Interior Overlay.

Noticing right now a weird behavior, I'm adding a short video where you can see that:
while I manually move the ship with the keyboard, (the SS isn't fixed very well obviously),
the Interior overlay keep steady while the ship moves.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/y9i1k9szwan1hyd/2018.02.27-15.44.mkv?dl=0

Edited February 27, 2018 by antipro
